subsection.name: Converting single documents
subsection.p: Here's an example that converts a single apt input file into a fo document. To produce a pdf from the result using Apache FOP, see eg ExampleFO2PDF.

subsection.name: Converting multiple documents
subsection.p: If you want to parse several source documents into a single fo file, so you can generate a single pdf from multiple source files, you should use the FoAggregateSink. A simple example is outlined below, refer to the API docs for more information.

subsection.name: Embedded use
subsection.p:
To compile and run the following example, you need the following dependencies on your classpath (tested versions in parentheses).
Compile: doxia-core (1.1.4), doxia-module-fo (1.1.1), doxia-sink-api (1.1.4)
Run: commons-configuration (1.10), commons-lang (2.6), plexus-utils (2.0.5), commons-collections (3.2.1), commons-logging (1.1.1).
